Title: Requires certain kratom products to include a warning label
Summary: Requires certain kratom products to include a warning label with disclosures including, but not limited to, that kratom may be addictive and to keep it out of reach of children.
LawCode: Amd ยง398-g, Gen Bus L (as proposed in S.8285 & A.5852-A)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to regulating the sale of kratom products
